description: Deliver final answer when task is COMPLETE. Use ask_master for questions/clarifications that need user response. Handoff marks task as done and returns control to parent.

handoff_type.description: REQUIRED: Declare handoff intent. Options: 'normal_answer' (chat/acknowledgment, no execution) or 'script_edit' (scene building, executes script)

answer.description: The final result of your task (can be any structured data) if you created files or you delegated and provided handoffs mention them in your final answer

documents.description: List of document paths from workspace you created and relevnt for the answer
